thread.title: Trevor Dalton

author: Trevor Dalton
title: Trevor Dalton
text: I would not hesitate in leaving a 5 star plus review for Trusted house sitters , we have used them four times in the last year and they have never disappointed. Excellent service, we have just renewed membership and I would urge all pet owners and potential sitters to do the same if you want stress free holidays and happy pets..A great organisation so pleased we found them.
